description: Manages NetStream template configuration on HUAWEI CloudEngine switches.

record_name.description: Configure the name of netstream record. The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters.

description.description: Configure the description of netstream record. The value is a string of 1 to 80 case-insensitive characters.

collect_counter.description: Configure the number of packets and bytes that are included in the flexible flow statistics sent to NSC.

state.description: Specify desired state of the resource.

collect_interface.description: Configure the input or output interface that are included in the flexible flow statistics sent to NSC.

type.description: Configure the type of netstream record.

match.description: Configure flexible flow statistics template keywords.
